data.message: Please stop grouping "likes" or "shares" together.  Leave things in chronological order.  I don't need to see what someone liked yesterday or three days ago.  I thought this was done away with once already!

replies.message: Thanks for the question, Michael. Visit our Help Center for step-by-step instructions on how to change the order of the stories that appear in your News Feed: http://on.fb.me/1nIlfDM. -Chantal

SO WHEN IS FACEBOOK GOING TO CONTACT ME ABOUT HAVING MY NAME CHANGED BACK TO WHAT IT IS SUPPOSED TO BE? MY NAME IS NOT JAMES JOHNSON AND I WANT IT CHANGED BACK TO WHAT IT REALLY IS. WHAT PROOF DID YOU HAVE THAT MY NAME WAS NOT REAL TO MAKE ME CHANGE IT IN THE FIRST PLACE???? A RESPONSE WOULD BE GREAT!!!
Hi James. To help make sure everyone uses their authentic name, you can only change your name every 60 days. Learn more: http://on.fb.me/1wg2hGL -Chantal

I NEVER WANTED TO CHANGE MY NAME. YOU BLOCKED MY ACCOUNT. YOU CLAIMED MY NAME WAS NOT REAL (NOT HAVING ANY PROOF OTHERWISE). THEN WHEN I ATTEMPTED TO PUT MY REAL NAME YOU REJECTED IT. I PUT A FAKE NAME (JAMES JOHNSON) AND YOU ACCEPTED IT. NOW IM IN THE 60 DAY PERIOD OF NOT BEING ABLE TO CHANGE IT AT ALL. HOW DOES THIS SEEM RIGHT TO YOU????????????????????????????????????????????????

Thanks for your question, James. If you’re unable to change your name, find out why here: http://on.fb.me/1wg60nF. If you are still unable to change your name after following the tips, please let us know. -Chantal

I have read all that already and as far as i can tell you have failed to show where i violated anything. You just block my account and until i type in something you deem legit i cant access my account. Now i am displaying A FAKE NAME, which is what YOUR POLICY is against. Again I ask, and please answer me instead of copying a link: WHAT PROOF DO YOU HAVE THAT MY NAME WAS NOT REAL TO START WITH? Did you look at my ID? Run my social security number? NO. YOU ARE VIOLATING YOUR OWN POLICY. How about instead of copying some link that has nothing to do with my problem, actually look into it OR let me change my name BACK TO WHAT IT IS SUPPOSED TO BE!!!!????

I just want to change it back to what it was, WHAT EVERYONE KNOWS ME BY, not what YOU THINK IT SHOULD BE. Why dont you take this time and effort and go after bullying, or people that start fights, or kids being talked to by predators????

My settings are on "Most recent" however many friends' "likes" are showing up in groupings of multiple likes, regardless of when they actually "liked" the post or page.  Some of the "likes" originally appeared over the weekend, but are also now showing in my news feed today.
So true @Michael Pollino my most recent entries are not most recent
